Name: Verify Successful Checkout Process for Multiple Items
Description: Navigate to the home page, login, and access the recommended page. Add an item to the basket and proceed to the product page. Verify the product page after adding items to the basket.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home login > navigate to Page home
step 3: At Page home, click on hyperlink recommended > navigate to Page recommended
step 4: At Page recommended, click on img object
step 5: At Page recommended, click on img object > navigate to Page product
step 6: At Page product, click on button add to basket
step 7: At Page product, click on hyperlink home
step 8: At Page product, click on hyperlink home > navigate to Page home
step 9: At Page home, click on hyperlink see all
step 10: At Page home, click on hyperlink see all > navigate to Page recommended
step 11: At Page recommended, click on h5 object
step 12: At Page recommended, click on h5 object
step 13: At Page recommended, click on hyperlink view account
step 14: At Page recommended, click on hyperlink view account > navigate to Page account
step 15: At Page account, click on li object
step 16: At Page account, click on li object
step 17: At Page account, click on li object
step 18: At Page account, click on li object
step 19: At Page account, click on hyperlink shop
step 20: At Page account, click on hyperlink shop > navigate to Page shop
step 21: At Page shop, click on h5 object > navigate to Page product
step 22: Add visual checkpoint at Page product

Name: Verify Navigation and Product Display in Shop Section
Description: Navigate to the home page, login, and access the shop section. Return to the shop page and view the displayed product. Verify the product page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home login > navigate to Page home
step 3: At Page home, click on hyperlink shop > navigate to Page producs
step 4: At Page producs, click on button go back > navigate to Page shop
step 5: At Page shop, click on div object
step 6: At Page shop, click on div object > navigate to Page product
step 7: Add visual checkpoint at Page product

Name: Verify Sign in Page after Adding Item to Basket
Description: Navigate to the home page, select a product, and add it to the basket. Click on the sign-in link and verify the sign-in page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home login > navigate to Page home
step 3: At Page home, click on img object > navigate to Page product
step 4: At Page product, click on button add to basket
step 5: At Page product, click on hyperlink sign in > navigate to Page signin
step 6: Add visual checkpoint at Page signin

Name: Verify Checkout Process and Information Input
Description: Navigate to the home page and sign in. Select a product and add it to the basket. Proceed to checkout, enter personal information, and complete the checkout process. Verify the checkout page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home, click on hyperlink sign in > navigate to Page signin
step 3: At Page signin, input on input email > navigate to Page home
step 4: At Page home, click on hyperlink plant now > navigate to Page shop
step 5: At Page shop, click on div object > navigate to Page product
step 6: At Page product, click on button add to basket
step 7: At Page product, click on svg object
step 8: At Page product, click on button check out > navigate to Page checkout
step 9: At Page checkout, click on button next step
step 10: At Page checkout, input on input fullname
step 11: At Page checkout, input on input email
step 12: At Page checkout, input on input address
step 13: At Page checkout, input on input object
step 14: At Page checkout, click on input object
step 15: At Page checkout, click on button next step
step 16: Add visual checkpoint at Page checkout

Name: Verify Sign up Page after Navigating from Shop Section
Description: Navigate to the home page, access the shop section, and view a product. Click on the sign-up link and verify the sign-up page.
Test Steps:
step 1: Navigate to Page home
step 2: At Page home, click on hyperlink shop > navigate to Page producs
step 3: At Page producs, click on button go back > navigate to Page shop
step 4: At Page shop, click on div object
step 5: At Page shop, click on div object > navigate to Page product
step 6: At Page product, click on hyperlink sign up > navigate to Page signup
step 7: Add visual checkpoint at Page signup
